duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform quality checks on outbound and inbound shipments.
Execute ERP system transactions on outbound and inbound shipments.
Update FMS for parcel and freight shipments.
Use handheld RF scanners and Warehouse Management System to fulfill orders.
Handle and control hazardous material on both inbound and outbound.
Comply with safety, housekeeping practices, and regulations.
Maintain inventory accuracy.
Lift up to 75 pounds unassisted.
Create repair RMA's, manage receiving and shipment issues within repair systems.
Develop familiarity with products, processes, operational metrics, and software tools.
Provide input towards continuous improvement, work instruction documentation, and standardization of processes.
Perform basic equipment evaluation and maintenance.
Create expense orders for internal repair consumption.
Service customer product, including evaluating and validating customer complaint information, repair history, troubleshooting, and contract entitlement.
Create work instructions, check sheets, or other process documentation.
Train associates in basic work assignments and share information with the team.
Ensure compliance with ISO requirements and external auditors.
Resolve a variety of basic problems under direct supervision and perform rudimentary analysis.
Obtain certification as an emergency responder and training in other areas of safety.
Perform other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED preferred but not required.
